mapper.insert: insert into T_APPLICATION (AP_ID, AP_RCID, AP_VIID, AP_STATE,AP_DATE) values (SEQ_AP.nextval,#{apRcId.rcId},#{apViId.viId},#{apState},#{apDate})
mapper.update:
update T_APPLICATION
AP_TIME=#{apTime},
AP_STATE=#{apState},
where AP_ID=#{apId}
mapper.select:
select * from T_APPLICATION
left outer join T_RECRUITMENT on AP_RCID=RC_ID left outer join T_JOB on J_RCID=RC_ID left outer join T_DEPARTMENT on J_DPID=DP_ID
left outer join T_VISITOR on AP_VIID=VI_ID left outer join T_RESUME on RS_VIID=VI_ID left outer join T_BASIC on BS_RSID=RS_ID
where AP_ID=#{apId};
